裵字的基本解释

裵
péi
古同“裴”。

裵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péi］
［《廣韻》薄回切，平灰，並。］
亦作“裵1”。
(1)衣长貌。
(2)见“裴回”。
(3)姓。三国魏有裴潜。见《三国志·魏志》本传。
[②]［féi］
［《廣韻》符非切，平微，奉。］
古地名用字。

裵字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　裵； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1119第02
【篇海】同裴。

裵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
裵字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Bae
péi
Gu Tong "Pei".
Bae
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péi］
["Guangyun" thin back cut, flat gray, combined. ]
Also known as "Bao 1".
(1) Dress length and appearance.
(2) See "Pei Hui".
(3) Last name. Three Kingdoms Wei has Pei Qian. See the biography of "Three Kingdoms·Weizhi".
[②]［féi］
["Guangyun" Fu Feiqie, Pingwei, Feng. ]
Ancient place names use words.
Bae
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　裵; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1119 Page 02
[Pianhai] Same as Pei.
